headline.print_headline: ‘C’mon, Man!’ Obama Brings an ESPN Phrase to the Campaign Trail
headline.main: Obama Brings ESPN’s ‘C’mon, Man!’ to the Campaign Trail

snippet: The sarcastic slogan testifies to the president’s exasperation with an election season that has been defined by vitriol and name calling....
lead_paragraph: The sarcastic slogan testifies to the president’s exasperation with an election season that has been defined by vitriol and name calling.
